programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Bakit May Pag-Ibig Pa?
programme.desc: The movie is divided into two episodes; the first half tells the story of a spirited ex nun and a dispirited architect. The second half tells another chance between two former lovers.

programme.title: Sa Isang Sulok Ng Mga Pangarap
programme.desc: Alice Dixson turned in two powerful performances as the young woman forced into plastic surgery and as the wife she was made to resemble who got hold of her husband's (Ariel Rivera) money and then ran off with her lover.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Hindi Pa Tapos Ang Laban
programme.desc: In a world where the most corrupt are the most powerful, is there a room a good manâ€™s quest for justice to succeed? The undisputed King of Action takes on the role of a modern day crusader in this exciting, action packed movie that pits the powers of goodness against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Bala Ko Ang Hahatol
programme.desc: Gino (Robin Padilla) kills Rudy (Rey PJ Abellana) and brings Rudy's wife Cristina (Nina Sara) to his boss. Still not in her right mind, Cristina re-enacts her traumatic experience and kills the man in the process.

programme.title: Erpat Kong Forgets
programme.desc: What happens when Dad exchanges lifestyle with his son? Join Ariel (Aga Muhlach) and his widowed Erpat (Eddie Garcia) in this riot of a comedy on young and not so-young love.

programme.title: Pag-Ibig Ko Sa Iyo'y Totoo
programme.desc: A police officer lost his partner and girlfriend on the job. To forget the tragedy, he accepted the offer to become the bodyguard of a rich, young singing star whose father he has rescued from kidnappers.

programme.title: Epifanio ang Bilas Ko
programme.desc: This merry romp spoofs the highly successful "Epimaco Velasco Story" but instead of a heroic NBI detective with a bumbling private eye in the lead, Epifanio and his brother-in-law heads a detective and security agency.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Love At First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 17, Day 9 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to ghosts. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #4 I'm going to study Japanese at a university. / Talk about your plans. Put "shimasu" after the plan to explain what you are going to do.

programme.title: BOSAI: Be Prepared
programme.desc: This episode introduces Japan's unique volunteer fire corps composed of local residents who often arrive at a disaster scene before professional firefighters. A Thai reporter visits Sano City.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: A sumo tournament is being held in London for the first time in 34 years. At a screening of Grand Sumo Legends, Wajima: The Golden Left, attendees can learn about NHK WORLD-JAPAN's useful services.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Mizushiri Yoriko won the Silver Bear in the short film competition at the 2025 Berlin International Film Festival. She talks about her passion for creating animations that evoke a sense of touch.

programme.title: Passing the Torch of Peace
programme.desc: Ari Beser's grandfather served on the planes that dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Harada Kosuzu's grandfather survived both. Now they are fighting for a world without nuclear weapons.

programme.title: 1/1000: Lay Judges
programme.desc: 1 in 1000 Japanese have experience as a lay judge in court cases. We witness a networking event for former lay judges, where they discuss unique experiences. What does it feel like to judge others?

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: A Spring Party
programme.desc: We visit one of the most famous cherry blossom spots in Edo. Flower viewing parties were for eating, drinking and making merry. It was also an opportunity for young men and women to mingle.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Miso paste, soy sauce and other Japanese fermented foods are increasingly popular abroad. But in Japan, many regional fermentation traditions face the risk of extinction. We explore a growing crisis.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Limited mobility can restrict blood flow, causing pressure injuries. To address them, Japanese experts are developing advanced bedding and other technologies.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batsonâ€™s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one wordâ€”SHAZAM!â€”this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heartâ€”inside a ripped, godlike bodyâ€”Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But heâ€™ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 8
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
